Personal Dotfile I use ArchLinux as Linux distribution and i3 as windows manager, this repo is my config. The packages I explicitly installed are in packages.txt. You can use <code>config/i3/nord.sh</code>nord and <code>config/i3/cat.sh</code> catppuccin to change the theme.
